basics.name: Anthony Dellavecchia
basics.label: Need a young, creative, problem-solver with leadership characteristics â“
basics.summary:
Hello! Thanks for your interest in my profile. Please feel free to connect and get to know me!

Let's grab some coffee: https://calendly.com/anthonyjdella

As a UCLA graduate student with a thirst for knowledge, my goal is to develop and improve my skills each day. My attitude and desire to learn is what will help me grow and achieve my goals.

On December 2016, I received Cum Laude Latin honors, as a college graduate with a degree in Information Technology and Systems from The University of Texas at Dallas. 

Earlier that summer, I had a wonderful experience as an ETL developer intern at General Motors Financial. I was able to gain a great deal of business and IT insight, and it helped me discover my passion for data. After the internship program, I was fortunate enough to be promoted to a part-time employee in ETL Production Support. 

I previously worked at Bank of America as a software developer, and it helped me discover my love of developing customer-facing applications. I learned about the Financial Center business and the importance of providing a great user experience.

I currently work at State Farm as an object oriented full stack software developer for the renters insurance application on StateFarm.com.

I've had experience in various industries which has broadened my skillset. For instance, as a certified TESOL teacher I learned how to be a leader as I taught, planned, and implemented courses for elementary school students; I've learned customer satisfaction skills and how to communicate effectively as a server/host at multiple restaurants; and working with a small eCommerce company has taught me about the importance of adaptability and process improvement. 

I'm very passionate about software development, user experience design, and data.

Outside of work and education, I enjoy: 
âœˆï¸ Traveling the world and learning about cultures
ðŸ’» Playing with new technologies
ðŸŽ¨ Expressing my creative side through art & design
ðŸ€ Watching sports

awards.summary: Achieved a 4.0 GPA during the semester. This award is for students with a GPA among the Top 10% in the Naveen Jindal School of Management.

references.name: Britten Burchardt
references.reference: Anthony is not only an eager and detail oriented co-worker but also an inspiring professional. Anthony was a fantastic person to work with. Anthony is a forward thinking natural leader that cannot be overestimated. Efficient, highly motivated, self motivated and strong team player with a great skill to analyze and summarize ideas. His high expertise and leadership and his straight-to-problems way of thinking makes Anthony view solutions instead of problems. For Anthony the job is always the most important thing to do.
